title: Drawing, Neptune Riding over the Sea in a Chariot, ca. 1820
title_raw: Neptune Riding over the Sea in a Chariot
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on off white laid paper
markings: Watermark: part of a lily in double segement
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Seated in chariot, accompanied by woman. God holds chariot's reins, which are fastened to merman who  blows into horn. Another merman holds musical instrument.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Neptune Riding over the Sea in a Chariot, ca. 1820. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on off white laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1048
